channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ボブ・アイガーの側近やディズニーの関係者は、ハリウッドのストライキに加え、ディズニーの挑戦に圧倒され、疲弊していると語っている（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Sources in Bob Iger's inner circle and at Disney describe him as overwhelmed and exhausted by the challenges at Disney, compounded by the Hollywood strikes  —  Disney's legendary CEO came out of retirement to save the company—right in time for its 100th birthday.  Nothing has gone his way.

item.title: ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナルのエヴァン・ガーシュコビッチ記者、ロシアでの逮捕に対する上訴に敗れる。
item.description:
Associated Press:
Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich loses his appeal against his arrest in Russia, meaning he will stay in jail at least until November 30  —  A Wall Street Journal reporter who was detained in Russia on espionage charges lost his appeal against his arrest Tuesday …

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの戦争を取材中のパレスチナ人ジャーナリスト3人が死亡、1人が負傷、パレスチナ人カメラマン2人が行方不明となっている（Katy Migiro/Committee to Protect ...）
item.description:
Katy Migiro / Committee to Protect Journalists:
Three Palestinian journalists have been killed while reporting on the Israel-Hamas war, another was injured, and two Palestinian photographers are missing  —  The Committee to Protect Journalists said on Monday that it was deeply disturbed by reports that at least six journalists were among …

item.title: ネットフリックス・サービスUK、2022年の売上高は前年比12％増の15.4億ポンド、税引前利益は同22％増の3410万ポンド、平均有料会員数は同4％増（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Netflix Services UK reports 2022 revenue up 12% YoY to £1.54B, pre-tax profits up 22% YoY to £34.1M, and the average number of paid subscriptions up 4% YoY  —  - Drama Schools Uncovered: Student Says College That Made Gary Oldman A Star Failed To Protect Her From A Classmate She Accused Of Sexual Assault

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙オピニオン編集長キャスリーン・キングスベリーへのインタビュー：どのコラムニストが購読を促進するかという指標を用いないこと、ドナルド・トランプの論説など（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
An interview with New York Times Opinion Editor Kathleen Kingsbury on not using metrics for which columnists drive subscriptions, a Donald Trump op-ed, and more  —  Kathleen Kingsbury on the upcoming election, a Trump op-ed and recent rows at the NYT.  —  The opinion editor of The New York Times …

item.title: Xがイスラエルとハマスの誤報を緩和することに失敗したため、メタはリアルタイムのニュースをスレッドの柱とし、アプリに存在意義を与える機会を得た（Casey Newton/Platformer）
item.description:
Casey Newton / Platformer:
As X fails to moderate Israel-Hamas misinformation, Meta has an opportunity to make real-time news a pillar of Threads and give the app an existential purpose  —  Three months into its existence, the app's purpose may be coming into focus — if Meta will embrace it

item.title: WGA、9月27日に148日間にわたるストライキを終結させ、8,435票の「賛成」票と90票の「反対」票により、3年間のAMPTP新契約を批准（Deadline）
item.description:
Deadline:
The WGA ratifies its new three-year AMPTP contract, following 8,435 “yes” votes and 90 “no” votes, after ending the guild's 148-day strike on September 27  —  (Updated with SAG-AFTRA statement) Writers have officially approved their deal with the studios.

item.title: ABCニュース、元GMAプロデューサーのカースティン・クロフォードが、上司マイケル・コーンに対するセクハラ疑惑を無視したと訴えた訴訟で和解（Winston Cho/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Winston Cho / Hollywood Reporter:
ABC News settles former GMA producer Kirstyn Crawford's lawsuit that accused the network of ignoring sexual harassment allegations against her boss Michael Corn  —  The lawsuit from Kirstyn Crawford accused the network of ignoring sexual harassment allegations against then news executive Michael Corn.

item.title: LinkedInのニュースルームは、30カ国、17言語に250人の編集者とライターを擁し、他のプラットフォームが撤退する中、ニュースへの取り組みを倍増させている（Jim Edwards/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Jim Edwards / Press Gazette:
A look at LinkedIn's newsroom, which has 250 editors and writers across 30 countries and 17 languages, as the platform doubles down on news as others pull back  —  Linkedin's editor-in-chief Daniel Roth explains how the platform is prioritising and promoting news.

item.title: ネットフリックスは、ケニアで25％の番組と映画を提供していたモバイル無料層を11月1日に2年で終了し、月額～6ドルの広告層を展開する予定（Duncan Miriri/Reuters）
item.description:
Duncan Miriri / Reuters:
Netflix plans to end its free mobile tier in Kenya, which offered 25% of its shows and movies, after two years on November 1, and rolls out a ~$6/month ad tier  —  Netflix (NFLX.O) said on Monday it is ending its free mobile plan in Kenya, which has allowed users to access a quarter of its shows …

item.title: スポティファイ、インドで無料層に試聴制限を追加し、有料契約を促進；インドはスポティファイのMAU数で上位5市場の1つだが、収益では上位に入らない（Amit Gurbaxani/Music Ally）
item.description:
Amit Gurbaxani / Music Ally:
Spotify adds listening restrictions to its free tier in India to drive paid subscriptions; India is one of Spotify's top five markets by MAUs but not by revenue  —  Nearly five years after it launched in India, Spotify is adding a layer of restrictions for its free users there.

item.title: 調査：2023年初め、ベトナムはX投稿を通じて、米下院議員、CNN記者、米政策専門家の携帯電話にプレデター・スパイウェアを仕込もうとした（ワシントン・ポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Investigation: earlier in 2023, Vietnam tried to plant Predator spyware on the phones of US Congress members, CNN journalists, and US policy experts via X posts  —  The attempts appear to have been unsuccessful, but came as the U.S. and Vietnam were negotiating an agreement that President Biden signed last month in Hanoi

item.title: 情報筋：アクティビスト投資家であるネルソン・ペルツのTrian Fundは、現在ディズニーの株式の25億ドル以上を保有する最大投資家の一人であり、ディズニーの取締役会の議席獲得に向けて新たな働きかけを計画している（Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: activist investor Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund, now one of Disney's largest investors with a $2.5B+ stake, is planning a fresh push for Disney board seats  —  Activist's Trian Fund Management has accumulated a holding valued at more than $2.5 billion  —  Nelson Peltz is planning a fresh push for board seats at

item.title: ポッドキャストをアップルのポッドキャスト・チャートの上位に押し上げるため、ポッドキャストのダウンロード数を人為的に増加させる家内制手工業について（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
A look at the cottage industry around artificially boosting podcast download numbers, in order to push podcasts to the top of Apple's podcast charts and more  —  The News  —  Earlier this year, PJ Vogt received a strange proposition: If he paid a few dollars to a small self-described media buying company …

item.title: ユーザーによる音楽データベースであり、物理的な音楽メディアのマーケットプレイスであるDiscogsについて。
item.description:
Natalie Weiner / The Verge:
A look at Discogs, a user-generated music database and marketplace for physical music media, as sellers complain about the website's old tech and increased fees  —  A home for music diehards has been fractured by increased fees that are pushing sellers and shoppers to other platforms.
